Package ie.atu.sw

Class BookIndexer

java.lang.Object
ie.atu.sw.BookIndexer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Indexer
public class BookIndexer extends Object implements Indexer
Implements the methods of an indexer in relation to indexing a book

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    index()
    Implements the index method to combine data from the book and dictionary data (ignoring stop words) into an ordered index
    void
    printIndex(String output, boolean outputOrder)
    Implements the printIndex method to output the ordered index to an output file, including total unique word count, definitions for words and pages they occur on.

      Constructor which provides ability to instantiate a BookIndexer using String filepaths
      Parameters:
      bookPath - filepath to a text file
      dictionaryPath - filepath to a csv file
      stopWordsPath - filepath to a common words text file

  • Method Details

    • index

      public void index()
      Implements the index method to combine data from the book and dictionary data (ignoring stop words) into an ordered index
      Specified by:
      index in interface Indexer

    • printIndex

      public void printIndex(String output, boolean outputOrder)
      Implements the printIndex method to output the ordered index to an output file, including total unique word count, definitions for words and pages they occur on.
      Specified by:
      printIndex in interface Indexer
      Parameters:
      output - name of the output file to print to
      outputOrder - the order in which the index should be printed
